data.-update=false: If true, modules already downloaded will be checked for updates and updated if necessary.
data.-no-color: If specified, output won't contain any color.

Description:
Downloads and installs modules needed for the configuration given by
  PATH.
  This recursively downloads all modules needed, such as modules
  imported by modules imported by the root and so on. If a module is
  already downloaded, it will not be redownloaded or checked for updates
  unless the -update flag is specified.
